title: Simulation Education for Strengthening Ethical Competencies in Accounting Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of basic accounting principles and practical experience
context.additional_context: Recreating real-world accounting job scenarios in VR environments and training to resolve ethical dilemmas

learning_goals: Learners can apply accounting professional ethics codes to real-world cases with over 80% accuracy
Learners can advance and explain ethical decision-making processes through at least three stages (based on Kohlberg’s theory) in simulated environments
Learners identify ethical risk factors and achieve over 4 points on evaluation criteria for alternative-proposing abilities during project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
